QuestData.Title: King Forgalash's Burden
QuestData.Description: That sea witch spoke the truth.$B$BI witnessed the Tidemistress confer with King Forgalash on several occasions.$B$BKill Forgalash and bring the prow from his shoulder to Fjolrik as proof of his demise.$B$BI will meet afterwards in the center of Jandvik. I need to warm myself by its fires.
QuestData.LogDescription: Retrieve Forgalash's Prow from King Forgalash in Forgalash's Den.
